name: Mrs.zombie [ฺBeta-ENG ver.]
description:
Mrs.zombie is a detective game with a single ending (laughs).

Maybe because of our inexperience, we couldn't create a detective game with a thrilling system. Therefore created to be a trial version of the game to test for bugs or continuous game operations

For that reason, if players encounter bugs or errors in the game, they can report it.

Will fix and adjust in the next game.

And as announced It's an experimental game that I use Translator++ to translate.

 If the dialogue is so weird that you can't continue, please tell me!

Interesting things in the game

> main character story

> There are shortcuts and hints.

> Role-playing and switching system
